paper_abstract: Combining testimonial reports from independent and partially reliable information sources is an important epistemological problem of uncertain reasoning. Within the framework of Dempster-Shafer theory, we propose a general model of partially reliable sources, which includes several previously known results as special cases. The paper reproduces these results on the basis of a comprehensive model taxonomy. This gives a number of new insights and thereby contributes to a better understanding of this important application of reasoning with uncertain and incomplete information. (C) 2005 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Modeling partially reliable information sources: A general approach based on Dempster-Shafer theory
